definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Avoid use of future tense; it is rarely necessary.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用未來式，這是很少需要的。

sentences.english: The future of "I give" is "you take".

sentences.chinese: 老人家重未來式，年青人重現在式。
